Text.Page:
I know you're a busy , but {@LinkCreature:76#1018} asked to speak with you if you have a moment.

{@LinkCreature:76#1036} left for Kaiator this morning. I'm so proud of his persistence, and grateful for your generosity.

When {@LinkCreature:76#1036} first came to {@Rgn:76001}, I admired his determination to succeed. Had he grown up in Castanica, he'd no doubt have had a spectacular crucible ceremony.

As a token of my respect, could you please give {@LinkCreature:76#1036} this sword hilt?

I'm so nervous. They're holding my hushang in an hourâ€”one just for me. Kaia herself gave me a blessing. She said I've got real altitude.

Can I get any luckier?"Take a look at this, and answer the question."

Wow! It's amazing. I'll add it to my sword so I never forget everyone who helped me conquer my hushang.

Thank you, .
